problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AC与BD相交于点O,AB⊥AC,∠DAC=45°,AC=2,则BD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AC and BD intersect at point O, AB ⊥ AC, ∠DAC = N_0, AC = N_1, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB⊥AC,∴∠BAC=90°,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,AC=2,∴AD∥BC,AO=\frac{1}{2}AC=1,BD=2BO,∵∠DAC=45°,∴∠ACB=∠DAC=45°,∴∠ABC=180°-90°-45°=45°,∴∠ABC=∠ACB,∴AB=AC=2,由勾股定理得:BO=√{2²+1²}=√{5},∴BD=2BO=2√{5},故选:B．
